Mayor & Council
===============

1400 Schertz Parkway Schertz TX 78154

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1400+Schertz+Parkway+Schertz+TX+78154)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

1400 Schertz Parkway  
Schertz, TX 78154

Phone:

[210-619-1030](tel:2106191030)

### Contact Us

   1400 Schertz Parkway  
   Schertz, Texas 78154

   Hours: Monday - Friday  
   8 a.m. - 5 p.m.
